Delete Welcome Welcome to Oxygen Updater! This app will allow you to download the latest Android™ updates for your Oxygen® OS powered device early after release. \n\nSwipe to the left to continue. Choose your device: The device to receive updates for is usually automatically selected. If not, select the right device above.\n\nWhen more devices running Oxygen OS are released, they\'ll automatically be added and you will be notified!\n\nSwipe to the left to continue. Choose your update method: Usually, the incremental update is the right choice here.\n\nAre you using a rooted device or do you skip updates regularly (e.g. you want to update 5.0 to 6.0)? Select Full update.\n\nSwipe to the left to continue. You are ready to go! Enjoy using this app!\n\nYou can always change your settings by clicking the three dots in the top right corner (or press your Menu button) following a tap on \'change device and update method\'. start app Install guide Contextual image. Please tap on a lower place on the screen to hear the install guide. Download the update. - It\'s recommended to write all steps down, as you\'ll need to power off your device during the installation of the update.\n\n- Press the Download button to start downloading the update.\n\n- The download progress will appear in the app, and as a notification in your notifications screen.\n\n- When the download has finished, you\'ll see a notification with the text \"Download complete\".\nIf a download error occurred, open the app and try to downloading the update again. If this doesn\'t work, make sure you have a working connection. Otherwise, contact the developer of the app. You can do this by visiting the \"My apps\" section of the Google Play Store. Enter Recovery Mode. - First, power off your device.\n\n- Then, press both the power and the volume down buttons at the same time.\n\n- Your device will now start in Recovery Mode. Wait until you see the recovery menu on your screen. Apply the downloaded update. - Within the recovery menu, choose your desired language first. Next, tap on (or use the volume buttons to navigate and the power button to select) \"Install from SD\".\n\n- Next, scroll down using the volume down key until you find a row with the text \"Download\". \n\n- Tap on \"Download\", and tap on the \".zip\" file with the file name shown within the app. (Usually, this is a file starting with \"OnePlusOxygen-\").\n\n- Installation of the update will start automatically. Restart your device. - When the installation of the update is finished, you\'ll be back at the Recovery Menu. Within the recovery menu, tap on \"Reboot\".\n\n- Your device will show its startup screen for a long time during starting up.\n\n- Afterwards, you\'ll see a white message with the title \"Android is upgrading\", while your apps are being optimized. Done. Enjoy the new Oxygen OS version! - After your device has finished optimizing its apps, the update has been successfully installed.\nTo verify this, you can check the current version of your system as following:\n\n- Go to Settings, tap on \"About Phone\", and check the Oxygen OS Version.\n\n- If you like this app, give it 5 stars at Google Play!
